item.title: Tidy Tuesday 2019-49
item.description: Here is my entry for #TidyTuesday from 2019-50: ‘You can make it in R.’ Import the Data library(tidyverse) library(gganimate) library(waffle) d <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2019, week = 50) diseases <- d$diseases murders <- d$international_murders guns <- d$gun_murders regents <- d$nyc_regents Part 1: Diseases The first plot was inspired by an interactive graphic from WSJ. The data for these visuals comes from the Tycho Project. To start, let’s add a column that provides a rate of disease incidence.
